game.name: ONE FENIX DOWN
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A retro-inspired, classic turn-based RPG for those with nostalgia for the '90s golden era. Explore a vast world with 14 playable characters, fight hundreds of unique enemies, and delve into an epic story of war, betrayal, and redemption.
